ygData.subject: Re: looking for info in Thicken Mana series
ygData.msgSnippet: wow... no emails from this grop for what... over a month... and then suddenly 14?  almost fell out of my chair! This is probably one of the most pleasant
ygData.messageBody:
wow... no emails from this grop for what... over a month... and then
suddenly 14? almost fell out of my chair!

This is probably one of the most pleasant aspects of the game I've seen so
far... the brownie camp is the only place an enchanter can really get into
that no other -40(?) can get into. Oh yes, and Nillipus is an outcast
brownie I believe. I've also seen the odd brownie in Greater Faydark, but
not for a long time... I guess they've given up on that land.

There must be some way to forge an alliance with these brownies, perhaps
even make them a little less benevolent towards us... they all cast spells
so be aware that you cant get very close without being their friend. FYI,
the brownie camp is at about 1517 3099 in L Fay.

Cogg - 24 on Rallos Zek


----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
To: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
Cc: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 10:32 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] looking for info in Thicken Mana series


> From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
>
> well....seeing as the only other Brownie, outside of Fay I've seen

does...
>
> *shrugs*
>
> Fistlebane
>
>
